articles.title: Zac Efron pays tribute to Matthew Perry in Hollywood Walk of Fame speech - BBC.com
articles.description: The High School Musical actor spoke at the unveiling of his star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
articles.content:
Zac Efron has paid tribute to late Friends Star Matthew Perry during a speech in Los Angeles.
